statements: UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_values = '{"temperature": 25, "humidity": 60}' WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_values = '{"temperature": 22, "humidity": 55}' WHERE robot_id = 2;
UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_values = '{"temperature": 27, "humidity": 70}' WHERE robot_id = 3;
UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_values = '{"joint1": 0.5, "joint2": 0.3}' WHERE robot_id = 1 AND calibration_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_values = '{"joint1": 0.7, "joint2": 0.4}' WHERE robot_id = 2;
UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_date = '2022-05-01', calibration_values = '{"joint1": 0.8, "joint2": 0.6}' WHERE robot_id = 3;
UPDATE calibration_data SET x_axis_calibration = 1.5 WHERE robot_id = 123;
UPDATE calibration_data SET y_axis_calibration = 2.0 WHERE robot_id = 456;
UPDATE calibration_data SET z_axis_calibration = 3.8 WHERE robot_id = 789;
UPDATE calibration_data SET x_axis_calibration = 1.5, y_axis_calibration = 2.0 WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE calibration_data SET z_axis_calibration = 0.8 WHERE robot_id = 2;
UPDATE calibration_logs SET log_description = 'Calibration successful' WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE RobotCalibrationData SET calibration_result = 1.5 WHERE robot_name = 'Robot1';
UPDATE RobotCalibrationHistory SET action_taken = 'Updated calibration date' WHERE calibration_id = 1;
UPDATE RobotCalibrationLogs SET log_message = 'Calibration successful' WHERE calibration_id = 1;
UPDATE RobotCalibrationData SET calibration_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE robot_name = 'Robot1';
UPDATE RobotCalibrationHistory SET action_taken = 'Calibration data verified' WHERE history_id = 12345;
UPDATE RobotCalibrationLogs SET log_message = 'Calibration completed successfully' WHERE calibration_id = 67890;
UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_value = 5.0 WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE robot_model SET manufacturer = 'New Manufacturer' WHERE model_id = 2;
UPDATE calibration_engineer SET engineer_phone = '123-456-7890' WHERE engineer_id = 3;
UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_value = calibration_value * 1.1 WHERE calibration_type = 'Temperature'
UPDATE robot_model SET production_date = NOW() WHERE model_id = 100
UPDATE calibration_engineer SET engineer_phone = REPLACE(engineer_phone, '+1', '+91') WHERE engineer_id = 200
UPDATE RobotCalibration SET calibration_result = TRUE WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE RobotParts SET part_name = 'New Part Name' WHERE part_id = 3;
UPDATE RobotMaintenance SET maintenance_description = 'Scheduled Maintenance' WHERE maintenance_id = 2;
UPDATE RobotCalibration SET calibration_result = TRUE WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE RobotMaintenance SET maintenance_description = 'Replaced malfunctioning part' WHERE maintenance_id = 3;
UPDATE RobotLogs SET log_message = 'System rebooted successfully' WHERE robot_id = 2;
